comment_0: It sounds like it's about a woman who is trying to resist temptation to sin because she's been raised on the fact that sex is evil by her conservative parents when she is out on the town.
comment_1: And it's also an answer to Georgia Satellites' song "Keep Your Hands To Yourself". Georgia Satellites: "Don't give me no lines and keep your hands to yourself".  Selena Gomez: "And I'm trying, trying, I'm trying, but I can't keep my hands to myself".
